review: These things are great, I have two.  I mostly use it for netflix and HBO Go without any problem.  It's also great for working through PBS content on your own time.  iTunes movie rentals and purchases work really well.  My only gripe is that it doesn't do Amazon content natively (though you could stream Amazon movies from a laptop via AirPlay,) but I think that's kind of expected since I'm pretty sure the whole point of apple selling this thing is to make it easier for people to spend money in the iTunes store.It would be nice if they opened up the development process a bit for this thing, being limited to the apps that are pushed out is a bit disappointing, I bet third-party developers could do some neat things with it.
author: Christopher Mactaggart

review: This is a  truly excellent product.  It is quick and easy to set up and has many uses.  However, I originally purchased it for projection of  photographs and videos, made with my Iphone, onto a large screen HD television.  It has become a modern digital still image and video projector.  For that use, it is peerless.
